overview: A group of teenagers who are full of food and all day, moving to Canada with their parents, can not integrate into society regardless of their academic and living habits. Immigration is not their choice! They have become self-defeating, and they have been tempted to make troubles all the time. They tried to challenge the whole environment and system and vent their inner dissatisfaction. There are countless girls around Chris, but he has to follow every month..
title: Crossline
